name: Bug report
about: Create a report to help us improve
title: "[BUG] "
labels: bug
assignees: ''
---

> Please fill in as much of the template below as you're able.

- **Summary**: A short summary of the problem.
- **Steps to reproduce**:
  1. Step one
  2. Step two
  3. ...
- **Expected behavior**: What you expected to happen.
- **Actual behavior**: What actually happened.
- **Environment**:
  - OS: (e.g. Windows 10/11, macOS, Linux)
  - PowerShell: (e.g. PowerShell 7.2.7, Windows PowerShell 5.1)
  - PSmediaManager version / commit: (if known)
- **Relevant logs / error output**: (please paste or attach)
- **Additional context**: (screenshots, config files, steps you tried)
